name: Tincker
description:
Tincker is a Clicker Game based on Tinder, were you can like to earn love or pass to earn buzz. With love you can buy upgrades, with buzz you can earn more love on match.  The game has 2 languages, English and Brazillian Portuguese.


How to Play

Its simple, you click, buy upgrades, and click more. Your love is your coin, and your buzz is your Match bonus. To match you just like and like more. Your Super Like is a bonus that multiply your love, and has a cool music. If the music is to loud you can change in config, as like the sound effects, language, window size and autosave.

Coming Soon

The game is in test, and has much more to do, like balancing upgrades and reset system, achievement, statistics and more. You can aways suggest and report something to me, and i'll be very gratefull.

Development

The game is been development by me, and it's my first real project, i expect that i can do a lot of cool things in it, and your opinion and suggestion are very important to me and to the game be every day more complete.
